title: Organizational Change Leadership: PBL and Simulation-Based Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational organizational management theories and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing problem-solving skills through experiential learning in a simulated environment with real-world organizational change cases for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply PBL methodologies to develop change management strategies in real organizational transformation scenarios
Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in resolving stakeholder conflicts and decision-making processes in VR simulation environments
Learners can demonstrate growth in organizational change leadership competencies through pre-post self-assessments using multi-level scales (e.g., 5-point scale)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
